mapper.select: SELECT t.id AS id,t.name AS name,t.leader AS leader, t.description AS description, t.status AS status,t.validTime AS validTime,t.qq AS qq, t.competitionId AS competitionId,u.id AS userId,u.username AS username, u.password AS password,u.role AS role,u.qq AS qq, u.avatar AS avatar,u.wechatCode AS wechatCode,u.isValid AS isValid, u.email AS email FROM team t LEFT OUTER JOIN team_user tu ON t.id=tu.teamId,user u WHERE tu.userId=u.id ;
